Create a 3D model of a dream house and use Blender to render a virtual tour.
Use Blender to create an animation of a character going through different emotions, such as happy, sad, angry, and scared.
Create a short film using Blender that tells a story with minimal dialogue but relies heavily on visual storytelling.
Use Blender to create a 3D model of a famous landmark, such as the Eiffel Tower or the Statue of Liberty, and use it to create a virtual reality experience.
Create a short animation using Blender that shows the process of creating a famous dish, such as sushi or pasta, from start to finish.
